trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism by which a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> can be resolved at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un meccanismo dal quale è possibile risolvere un <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The runtime manages state in an environment associated with each <xref:System.Activities.ActivityInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Il runtime gestisce lo stato in un ambiente associato a ogni <xref:System.Activities.ActivityInstance>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Activities.Location> is a read/write proxy to a value stored in this environment.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Activities.Location> è un proxy di lettura/scrittura a un valore archiviato in questo ambiente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Activities.LocationReference> provides a mechanism by which a <xref:System.Activities.Location> can be resolved at runtime.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.LocationReference> Fornisce un meccanismo dal quale un <xref:System.Activities.Location> può essere risolto in runtime.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.

trans-unit.source: The information about the activity execution environment, including values for variables, arguments, and delegate arguments associated with that environment.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni sull'ambiente dell'esecuzione di attività, includendo valori per le variabili, argomenti e argomenti del delegato associati a quel ambiente.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, extracts the location for a <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" /> from an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Una volta implementato in una classe derivata, estrae il percorso per un <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of a variable, argument, or delegate argument value.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso di una variabile, argomento o valore dell'argomento delegato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome di <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, gets or sets the culturally localized version of the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementata da una classe derivata, ottiene o imposta la versione localmente localizzata del nome del <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.

trans-unit.source: The localized version of the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.
Gets or sets the type of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the culturally localized version of the type of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementata in una classe derivata, ottiene o imposta la versione localmente localizzata del tipo del <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.

trans-unit.source: The localized version of the type of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.LocationReference" />.
